attributes.action: Bring back the death penalty for all major crimes including rape and murder
attributes.additional_details: I would like the government to do this because the rate of crime in the uk is on the rise each year and this could reduce it massively.  Our prisons are overflowing and huge threats to our society are being freed. Over all bring back the death penalty would make the people of our country feel safer and make our streets a better place to live in additionally it costs thousands to keep criminals in prison per year which is disgraceful
attributes.background: I would like the government or parliament  to discuss crimes worthy of the death penalty and what form of capital punishment should be brought back

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Hold a referendum on restoring the Death Penalty for murder
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709623

Bring back capital punishment for the rape of a child
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711979
